name: Richard's Island
description:
Richard's Island is a game in which your mission is to get as much cash from buildings on the island before your house collapses into the ocean.

Controlls:

WASD/mouse on  screen edge = move around

Scroll wheel = Zoom In/Out

RMB drag/Z,X = rotate camera 

LMB = Place

R= reset

P= reset Highscore
